completion_requirements: You have tried to book the apartment viewing. Either the booking was succesful or the time slot was unavailable.
completion_questions: ...stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
User.task_description: You are interested in viewing an apartment. Please schedule a viewing at North Hill Apartments for Monday at 3 for 2 hours. Your name is Mark. You have paid the application fee. Please include the following message with your booking request: I am very interested in this apartment and would like to see it right away!

Wizard.task_description: Help the user schedule a apartment viewing. (You can find the video tutorial under https://youtu.be/USrWF1ZyNWw, in case you want to watch it again.)
completion_requirements: You have scheduled the apartment viewing,
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
